description: Splits a list into two lists at the first instance of a specified separator element.

input.name: separator
input.description: The specified separator at which the list is split.

input.name: append
input.description:
Whether to append the separator element to the first list.
If unspecified, defaults to `False`.

input.name: prepend
input.description:
Whether to prepend the separator element to the second list.
If unspecified, defaults to `False`.

output.name: first
output.description: A list containing the values before the separator element.

output.name: second
output.description: A list containing the values after the separator element.
